## [1.1.1] - 2015-11-05
### Changed
- Don't crash when the config file doesn't exist.

## [1.1.0] - 2015-11-01
### Added
- `Config` class for handling persistent configuration across workflow updates.
- CHANGELOG

## [1.0.0] - 2015-10-31
### Added
- Library for making Alfred workflows.
